encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Submit - P. Ryl. 1 40: content from a mythological treatise (?)

Vote - Return-Straight-to-Sender - Fr. 1,4 add [.?], l.5 space before [π]έμπτον (complete word), l.8 space after Σίσυφο[ς] (complete word) and passim, fr.2, 26 add space before (κ̣(αί)) and accentuate with gravis (also in following line), l.13 no breathing on ἐν and no space before it; the preposition seems excluded before (πρ(ός)) - which should have a gravis. It would be good to add the readings suggested by ed.pr. in the apparatus. Metadata: add citation of Homer.
Submit - I have been digitally edited this papyrus in the webinar Digital Editions of Greek Literary and Paraliterary Papyri taught by Rodney Ast and Holger Essler.
